name: Gold necklace
desc: A golden necklace. Perhaps worn by a queen? Probably not.

name: Silver ring
desc: A plain ring with no special engravings.

name: Amethyst
desc: A valuable stone with many uses in alchemy, all of which is unknown to you.

desc: An idol of a god worshipped by the monsters. Maybe an exotics collector would buy this?

name: Obsidian key
desc: A purple and blackish key designed for a very specific door.
